snippet.title: There Will Be Ink - Now Out On Steam (Early Access)!
snippet.description:
There Will Be Ink is a tactical action game for 1-4 players. Play solo or with friends in battles between stick figure armies on a paper notepad, just like you used to draw in class instead of paying attention! Available now on Steam & itch.io. 

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1020450/There_Will_Be_Ink/

itch.io: 
https://summitfever.itch.io/there-will-be-ink
